attr.title: Wuppo
attr.desc: Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam. Open the Steam console and enter 'download_depot 400630 400631 7979843440656313703'. Once the download completes, navigate to the downloaded files. Right-click on Wuppo in your Steam library, go to Manage, then 'Browse Local Files.' Copy everything except the Funpack and Soundtrack folders. Go to your ROMs SD card, locate the 'ports/wuppo/assets' folder, and paste it there.
attr.inst_md:
1. Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam.
2. Open the Steam console and enter `download_depot 400630 400631 7979843440656313703`.
3. Once the download completes, navigate to the downloaded files.
4. Right-click on Wuppo in your Steam library, go to **Manage**, and select **Browse Local Files**.
5. Copy everything except for the **Funpack** and **Soundtrack** folders.
6. Go to your **ROMs SD card**, locate the `ports/wuppo/assets` folder, and paste the files there.
